item.title: How do i make it so i can see the players password because its in numbers
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Or you can just add this command… Password encryption is for the best.

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); sendMessage("Your new password is "+command.substring(5)); }

I’m not sure if you have to add any voids or booleans or anything cause this was already in my server. =\

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

or your server has very good password protection. on my server, no-one can access another persons password.

in your server, it might be something like this:

blah.blahblah: parseInt("playerPassword");

so basically, do what © CopyRight © said.
